level.heading: Application to registered foreign corporations.
level.text: A foreign nonprofit corporation authorized to do business in the District on the effective date of this chapter shall be subject to this chapter, but is not required to obtain a new certificate of registration to do business under this chapter.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 19-210 substituted "registered" for "qualified" in the section heading.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
